Short Bio

Known as the computer wizard by my friends, family, and co-workers, I have always had an intense curiousity about creativity, design, and computer technology. Even as a young child, most of my time was spent on the computer tinkering and breaking it. Arriving to my teenage years, I became interested in graphic design so I learned Photoshop 4 in order to create graphics for my first web site which was a music player that offered 8 songs. My professional experience has led to me work on many different digital mediums i.e. Branding, Web Design, Web Development, UX / UI, Photography and and Analytics.

Currently I live in Ladera Ranch, CA working as a Freelancer. I am open to consider certain full time opportunities.
